data.title: Legal notice
data.text:
MARANELLO WEBSITE TERMS AND CONDITIONS

This website is presented to you by the company MARANELLO. The use of this website is governed by the following terms and conditions. By using this website, you agree to these terms.

IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THE TERMS BELOW, PLEASE LEAVE THIS WEBSITE IMMEDIATELY.

Legal information

The content of the website www.maranello-europe.com was created for the sole purpose of providing information on the company MARANELLO. Commercial use of any of the information included on the website is prohibited, unless authorised in writing in advance by the company MARANELLO, the website publisher. Your use of the website is governed by the following terms and conditions.

General provisions for use

The website is monitored and managed from the administrative office of the company MARANELLO in Levallois-Perret (France), which makes no claim stating that these materials are adapted or available for use in every country. If you use the website when based in other regions, you alone are responsible for complying with applicable local legislation.

The company MARANELLO reserves the right to amend or correct, at any time and without prior notice, the content of the website and these terms and conditions. It cannot be held liable for any consequences resulting from these amendments.

If any part of these terms is deemed not applicable, that part shall be interpreted as far as possible in accordance with the applicable law, and all other provisions shall remain enforceable.

Intellectual property

The website is property of the company MARANELLO in its entirety, including all the rights relating thereto. Any reproduction, in whole or in part, of the website shall be systematically subject to the owners’ authorisation.

The design and content of the website together constitute copyrighted work under the laws in force on intellectual property, which is owned by the company MARANELLO.

Author’s rights

The texts, images, drawings, layout and brand identity style guide of this website are protected under intellectual property law.

It is forbidden to copy, extract, disseminate or amend the content of this website for commercial purposes. The text, images and graphic elements may be downloaded or printed solely for private use, but not commercial. Any reproduction of drawings, images, sound files, video sequences and texts in other electronic or printed publications requires the written consent of the company MARANELLO beforehand.

Failure to obtain such consent is punishable as fraud.

The company MARANELLO authorises the downloading of a copy of the information on the website in a temporary storage location for personal use only, provided that you do not remove, delete, alter or modify the pages or their content, or change any copyright, logo or any other sign such as registered trademark symbols or other protected rights (copyright, the ‘©’ or ‘®’ symbols, etc.), digital footprints or any other technical means created for identification.

Trademarks

The trademarks and logos on the website are registered and legally protected trademarks.

Any reproduction, in whole or in part, of these trademarks and/or logos, made using elements from the website, without express authorization from the company MARANELLO, constitutes intellectual property fraud under Articles L.335-2 and subsequent articles of the French Intellectual Property Code. MARANELLO trademark is a registered trademark of the MARANELLO company.

Databases

The databases created by the company MARANELLO are protected under author’s rights and by the law of 1 July 1998, which implements the European Directive of 11 March 1996 on the legal protection of databases in the French Intellectual Property Law. Unless otherwise authorised in writing by the company MARANELLO, any reproduction, representation, adaptation, translation and/or amendment, in whole or in part, of the databases or transferring them to another website, is forbidden.

Disputes

With the exception of the express provisions laid down above, anything contained in these terms and conditions shall not be construed as granting any kind of licence or right at the end of any copyright or any other intellectual property right term. As the holder of an intellectual property right, if you believe that your work has been unduly copied or distributed by this website, please notify the company MARANELLO immediately at the following address: 92, Rue Edouard Vaillant – 92300 Levallois-Perret • France

Your communications with the company MARANELLO

We always welcome your messages on MARANELLO’s website. Any messages or document that you send to the website by email or any other means, such as personal information, questions and answers, comments, suggestions, or other, shall not assume a confidential or exclusive nature of any kind, and shall be treated accordingly. Anything that you send or post online may be used by the company MARANELLO or granted by licence to third parties by the company MARANELLO, for use in any material whatsoever, including but not limited to the renting of mass mailing lists, propositions for products or services, reproduction, dissemination, transmission, publication, radio broadcasting and posting on the Internet. Furthermore, the company MARANELLO is entitled to use any idea, concept, know-how or techniques contained in any message that you send to the website, no matter the subject.

Exclusion of liability

Documents on the website may contain inaccuracies or errors. If you choose to use and visit this website, you do so at your own risk. The company MARANELLO or any other party involved in the design, development or consignment of this website shall not be required to pay direct or indirect damages as a result of you accessing or using the website. The company MARANELLO does not guarantee that the functional aspects of the website will never be interrupted or free from error, nor that this website, or the server that allows access to it, is free from viruses or other dangerous components. Without limiting the foregoing, everything on the website is offered to users “AS IS”, namely WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLICIT. The company MARANELLO reserves the right to make changes to the website at any time and without notice.

Links

The company MARANELLO shall not be held liable for links created directly or indirectly from its website, nor for the content of other websites. Hypertext links to other websites cannot be created unless authorisation has been obtained beforehand in writing from the company MARANELLO. Such authorisation may be revoked at any time. The existence of any link to websites related to www.maranello-europe.com does not imply endorsement of the company MARANELLO of the content of these pages external to its website or of any other website related to www.maranello-europe.com. Consequently, if you access another off-site page or other websites by a link, you do so at entirely your own risk.

You have the right to access, change, correct and delete your personal data.

In order to do so, simply send your request by letter to the following address: MARANELLO, 92 Rue Edouard Vaillant 92300 Levallois-Perret • France

Cookies information

In order to serve you better, we keep track of the number of pages viewed, the number of visits, and the number of visitors to our website, and the return rate. To this end, we use ‘cookies’ technology; cookies are issued by the server of the company OVH, which hosts the website. The cookies used by www.maranello-europe.com contain a unique identifier, generated randomly, and the date of your last visit.

Jurisdiction

In the event of a dispute, only the French law shall apply and the Paris courts (France) shall have sole jurisdiction. © 2020 – MARANELLO– All rights reserved.

Website designed by OVM Communication – 1bis Rue Georges Muylaert 59130 Lambersart • ovm-communication.com

Website hosted by OVH – 140 Quai Sartel, 59100 ROUBAIX • ovh.com

Publishing director: Mr Rémi Gammal
